sentence.Network_en: All the students are late, not excepting Luther.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有学生都迟到了, 卢瑟也不例外.

sentence.Network_en: Everyone, not excepting myself has the responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 每人都应负责(包括我自己).

sentence.Network_en: The source of meat for much of this region (excepting Japan) has traditionally been the pig.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个地区大部分地方（除日本外）的传统肉食是猪肉。

entry.def: You use excepting to introduce the only thing that prevents a statement from being completely true.

example.ex: The source of meat for much of this region (excepting Japan) has traditionally been the pig.
example.tran: 这个地区大部分地方（除日本外）的传统肉食是猪肉。

auth_sentence.content: This was received with great approbation by all, excepting my wife.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was received with great approbation by all, excepting my wife.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This was received with great approbation by all, excepting my wife.

auth_sentence.content: Excepting that he'd been a pretty decent salesman in his young years.
auth_sentence.res_content: Excepting that he'd been a pretty decent salesman in his young years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Excepting that he'd been a pretty decent salesman in his young years.

auth_sentence.content: The whole country, excepting the rougher banlieues, has become safe and welcoming for visitors and their money.
